about_the_game:
Experience the revolutionary new card game POWERCHARGE

PowerCharge is a turn based strategy card game about space warfare. Place workers on a grid to power your ship up to do more damage. Use beacons to synergize with positioning. Get your opponent down to 0 health to win.

Take full control of your turns

Draw cards when you need to, play cards when you need to, gain resources when you need to, replace your hand if you don't like it. In PowerCharge, you choose exactly what you need each turn.

Build your deck with tons of unique combinations

When building your deck, you choose 3 out of 9 cores. Each core focuses on a different strategy. Choose the combination that fits what you are looking for. Don't know where to start? Try one of our starter decks.

No Loot boxes. No Card Packs. Start with every card from the main set

Unlock all 113 cards from the main set straight away. Play whatever strategy you want to play.

Play Online or Offline

Play against other players around the world, including friends, or you can play against bots with 3 different skill levels.

Extra Features

  • Draft mode where you choose your cards against an opponent.
  • Change the rules of the game with the ruleset editor.
  • Load reloads of your past games.

  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or other equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti, HD 5830, Intel 630
  • Storage: 480 MB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1, Intel

short_description: Take to the stars in PowerCharge, a revolutionary new card game. Assemble your crew of over 100 possible cards. Position your workers strategically on the board to combo with beacons you place. Increase your power and deal massive damage to your enemy all at once. Will your crew rule the galaxy?
